answers.author: Toby Cotter
answers.text:
You go into the project thinking one ERP solution should work for all of us. You quickly learn that we are all very different with custom solutions within our existing systems. Make sure you are very specific with your expectations and your contract spells it out.

text:
The City of Tulsa would like to review sample procurement documentation that other organizations have used to select and implement an ERP solution. Additionally, if there were lessons learned from the procurement process, including things you would do differently next time, please share.
